programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: Magnum is hired by a woman to prove that her son didn't kill his girlfriend and has only 24 hours before the accused accepts a plea deal; Rick and TC try to recover stolen appliances that were donated to a wounded veteran.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: Magnum tries to catch a killer, who may be praying on wealthy men, by posing as a doctor on the same dating app that a murder victim was using.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When the Dobermans dig up what appears to be a human bone, Magnum and Higgins help Katsumoto investigate the murder of his former mentor.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When Magnum and Higgins get "yacht-jacked," Higgins gets shot, and she and Magnum are stranded at sea, struggling to reach land before she bleeds out and the culprits return to finish them off.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.sub-title: The Day It All Came Together
programme.desc: Magnum's ex shows up at his home with a gunshot wound, wanting his help to find her missing CIA father whose life is in danger; Magnum makes an earnest proposition to Higgins for her to become his private investigations partner.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: While Magnum waits for Higgins to decide if she'll officially become his partner, he takes the case of a missing wife who witnessed her boss's murder during a bank robbery; Rick makes a big decision about his career.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: A pickpocket asks Magnum for help when a cellphone he recently lifted receives a very suspicious text message; Magnum is frustrated when Higgins won't answer him about whether she will become his partner; Rick decides to make a bold career move.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick (Rob Stewart) is assigned to protect a young woman who is involved with an unscrupulous arms dealer. With Carolyn Dunn.

programme.desc: Nick (Rob Stewart) is framed for murder and drug-dealing by a vengeful con man he sent to prison years ago. With Carolyn Dunn.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick comes to the aid of a local tavern owner who is threatened by a gang of criminals attempting to take over an underground gambling ring.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth race the clock to tie up loose ends before the defendant in Booth's first FBI case is executed for the crime.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A girl's decomposed remains are found in a refrigerator, leading Brennan to confront her former mentor.

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Man in the Fallout Shelter
programme.desc: While trying to identify remains from the 1950's, Zack cuts into a bone and accidentally releases deadly fungus spores, causing the whole team to be quarantined in the lab over Christmas.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Extensive plastic surgery hides the identity of a body whose parts were found near an airport.

programme.desc: The cops get tangled in an elaborate online hoax that leads to the rape of a popular social media star; Benson sets new ground rules with Sheila.

programme.desc: Emotions run high as the squad embarks on a frantic search for Benson's missing son.

programme.desc: The SVU investigates a case involving two students in a special needs school; Rollins discovers that one child's medical issues stem from a surprising source.

programme.desc: An airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault; Fin makes sure Benson is protected at work.

programme.desc: After a female pundit is assaulted during a protest, Benson and Barba struggle to put their political beliefs aside to help bring the attacker to justice.

programme.desc: When an infant goes missing, members of the SVU find themselves taking sides in a family's right-to-die court case; Barba's interference in the case puts the entire DA's office in jeopardy.

programme.desc: A doctor arrested for sexually abusing his patients is set free after Cassidy's testimony causes a mistrial.

programme.desc: Carisi opens a police investigation when his niece reports a classmate for sexual assault; Stone learns there are no perfect witnesses when it comes to sex crimes.

programme.desc: A girl's tragic death becomes a criminal case when a surgeon harvests her organs without parental consent.

programme.desc: When a student disappears during a school trip to New York, the cops race to find a mysterious masked man; Fin and Stone both get visits from family.
